name: SHRED (HiKeng)
description:
SHRED is a 2D action game with a slice sense of space shooting game. 

You are an operator who assigned to test a prototype of a brand new designed spaceship - "SHRED 000", the spaceship which thrust to enemies in combat with its vast speed instead of shooting.

Dodge bullets and find a right moment to shred those enemies away with your thrust! 


* This game supports both keyboard and joy controller. *

Input
Keyboard Joy Controller Move Arrow Keys Left Toggle  Thrust X  (PS) or  (XBOX) or R1

The game is developed by a student from Thailand studying at Thammasat University, major Game Art Design (IDD-CDT).
